channel.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
channel.description:
[center][url=http://s13.zetaboards.com/The_Ascendancy/index/][img]http://i1074.photobucket.com/albums/w418/Kevin_Gruber/logo_zpsyxwvpe0w.png[/img][/url][/center]
[center][b]Remember the good ol days of Runescape when you lived for the grind? Ascendancy thrives to emulate the nostalgic feeling of playing Runescape, while taking away all of the repetitive zones that you will see on any given server. From a custom, fully programmed home area, to custom training zones, and of course the trademark Old-School graphics, Ascendancy is definitely a server worth checking out![/b][/center]
[center][b]24/7 vps Hosted New Content updates Weekly to Bi-weekly! Economy/Pking server 317 old school graphics! modified economy based drop rates! Custom slayer points system! Smooth combat system! Custom weapons Custom Questing 10 bosses and counting! custom training zones! unique home with custom shops! custom minigames! custom drops! Unique trading area! Custom skilling at Home! custom slayer tasks! Challenging xp rates![/b][/center]
[center][url=http://s13.zetaboards.com/The_Ascendancy/index/]Forums[/url] | [url=http://www.mediafire.com/download/q7fxnegjwqp8nc4/Ascendancy.jar]Download Client[/url][/center]

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
item.dc:creator: @rick20 rick20
item.description:
@rick20 wrote:

hmm, While donating is a future thing that we may add. we dont intend on making it a pay -to -win server in any way. the economy is balanced in such a way that if you work hard , you can succeed. and once again my friend. the goal is not to make the server a “p2w” server. come check us out and youll see what i mean ;D!
(the donater store is not even added at the moment as i said before and there is really no ETA on it LOL)
Thanks!
Rick~~

Read full topic

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique

item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
item.dc:creator: @rick20 rick20
item.description:
@rick20 wrote:

all of these items are items which you earn yourself, and you can sell/pk/drop do whatever you please with. our goal is to keep the server balanced and fun for everybody, while maintaining a sense of value for everything that you pick up! and as far as the donater shop goes, our shop is currently empty lol! our goal is not to make real money or sell things here. our main goal is to bring together a community that enjoys playing our server be it pking/skililng/grinding drops/selling in the trade zone. All of which are things we hope to have thrive on this server! as i have been saying! i encourage all of you to come and take a look at our server and see for yourself what our goal is!! we welcome you with open arms and are excited to meet new and enthusiastic players!
See you soon!!(hopefully!)
Thanks!!
Rick~~ ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
item.dc:creator: @Ykcud Ykcud
item.description:
@Ykcud wrote:

And these items are or are not tradeable?

Read full topic

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
item.dc:creator: @rick20 rick20
item.description:
@rick20 wrote:

neither! this is a completely economy based pking server! anything that you get, you get it from working for it! donaters are most definately welcome but the donater items give you 0 stats and are merely for show and to support our community!! i encourage you to get on and come join the fun!! ;D

Read full topic

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
item.dc:creator: @rick20 rick20
item.description:
@rick20 wrote:

Thanks for the good comments project!! I wish youd give it more than just logging in and asking for the ranged shop tho man!! Give us another shot during the day when more are on!! And were working on a fix atm for the cache placement as well…seems the main problem was people couldnt actually download the cache cuz the upload site was being annoying :S happy to say weve had a solid day again today though, and we appreciate everybody logging in and joining the fun!! Thanks everyone!! And please keep on visiting our server if you
Are enjoying us!!
Rick~~

EDIT: Very sorry with the problems we’ve been having with the cache the last few days, but now we have a dedicated host just for the cache and there should not be anymore problems with it!

Read full topic

i get connection error when i open client

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
item.dc:creator: @rick20 rick20
item.description:
@rick20 wrote:

hmm, dont worry bud well try to get you on.
in your users folder, are all of the files that pertain to the cache just randomly scattered in the bottom of the folder? if so, youll need to close all clients and put them into the ascendancy cache folder itself

also try deleting everything dealing with ascendancy cache out of your folder then re-download client, and also the cache. make sure you extract to user/home folder and like i said make sure everything gets extracted into the same folder (the cache files that is) after all of that is done just go ahead and hit run and you should be ok. if that doesnt work then just do me a favour and leave a post somewhere on our forums, and ill have kevin the other owner come and see if he can get you squared up bud!
sorry for the inconvenience!!

Read full topic

item.title: Ascendancy | Relive Nostalgia | Unique
item.dc:creator: @Retaliate Retaliate
item.description:
@Retaliate wrote:

[quote=“rick20, post:7, topic:552834”]Hi retaliate, i havent heard of it not working for anybody else… you could try removing the entire cache from your user folder then re-downloading it. Please make sure any other clients are closed when you do this!
Thanks!![/quote]

Hmm yes it’s not working. It just stays at “Starting Up” each time I try downloading it. I downloaded other client today and they seem to work just fine. I am not sure what’s going on.

Read full topic
